value:
Isn't Minerva adorable? She's even
caught on to my ninja act and started
growling more quietly!

In my world, I worked in the service
of House Virion, so I'm quite used to
dealing with lords and their demands.

Rather than trying to be stealthy, I'd
be better off charging in head-on?
Hmm... Who told you to say that?

Shuriken are a ninja weapon, no? And
yet, their cute shapes make them
nearly as adorable as Minerva's fangs!

I've heard that the food ninja eat is
made to be portable and nutritious.
I should add it to my repertoire.

I've come to deliver some goods
from $Nf...$k$pAnd now, my mission is complete.

Am I meeting your expectations of
how a ninja should perform? If you
are satisfied, then I am as well.

Let's take it slow today, Minerva. It
wouldn't do to get worked up and
cause a scene.

Oh my... Moving around in this outfit
is a bit more difficult than I expected.

Oh, is this for me? Very well. I will
strive to meet even the loftiest of
your expectations.

Is this where the ninja festival is being
held? Minerva and I are here to enjoy
the festivities.

Hello there. Enjoying your time at the
ninja festival, I hope? Minerva and I
are certainly having fun.$k$pAt first, I wasn't sure about wearing
these clothes, or even what acting
like a ninja meant...$k$pBut then I realized that ninja are
people who support their lords from
the shadows. That, I can understand.$k$pOf course, true loyalty does not mean
blindly following a lord's orders
without any hesitation.$k$pWhen someone is wrong, they must
be told so, and guided in a different
direction. That is true loyalty.$k$pSo take heart! If you ever stray from
the right path, Minerva may just have
a few words for you. Hehe...
Got you!
It ends now.
The mission is complete.
You won't escape me!
I still have much to learn...
My name is Cherche. I look forward to participating in this unique festival.
Ooh! Oh, did you fix my scarf? Thanks.
Minerva has been looking forward to the festival too.
If you have a top-secret mission, put me on it. I've done that kind of work before.
Virion would make a terrible ninja. He's too fond of standing out.
Whatever the sacrifice, I will ensure the mission is a success.
I made us some lunch! Take some time out to eat with me later.
As you ask.
You have an idea?
Unseen and unheard.
